TITLE: Greetings
DESCRIPTION: Manage greeting messages for your server

AUTOROLE.DESCRIPTION: setup role to be given when a member joins the server
AUTOROLE.SUB_ADD: setup role to be given when a member joins the server
AUTOROLE.SUB_ADD_ROLE_ID: the role id to be given
AUTOROLE.MISSING_ROLE: Please provide a role or role id
AUTOROLE.ROLE_NOT_FOUND: No matching roles found matching your query
AUTOROLE.EVERYONE_ROLE: You cannot set `@everyone` as the autorole
AUTOROLE.ROLE_PERM: I don't have the permissions to assign this role
AUTOROLE.MANAGED_ROLE: Oops! This role is managed by an integration
AUTOROLE.ENABLED: Autorole enabled! Users will now receive the `{{role}}` role when they join

WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: Configure the welcome message for your server
WELCOME.SUB_CHANNEL: Set the channel to send welcome message
WELCOME.SUB_THUMBNAIL: Enable or disable thumbnail in welcome message
WELCOME.SUB_COLOR: Set the color for welcome message
WELCOME.SUB_IMAGE: Set the image for welcome message
WELCOME.SUB_MSG_CHANNEL: the channel to send welcome message
WELCOME.SUB_MSG_THUMBNAIL: enable or disable thumbnail in welcome message
WELCOME.INVALID_CONTENT: Insufficient arguments! Please provide valid content
WELCOME.INVALID_COLOR: Invalid color. Value must be a valid hex color code
WELCOME.INVALID_IMAGE: Invalid image URL. Please provide a valid image URL
WELCOME.WELCOME_DISABLED: Welcome message not enabled in this server
WELCOME.CHANNEL_NOT_CONFIG: No channel is configured to send welcome message
WELCOME.ENABLED: Configuration saved! Welcome message is now enabled
WELCOME.DISABLED: Configuration saved! Welcome message is now disabled
WELCOME.CHANNEL_NO_PERMS: Ugh! I cannot send greeting to that channel? I need the `Write Messages` and `Embed Links` permissions in {{channel}}
WELCOME.CHANNEL_SET: Configuration saved! Welcome message will be sent to {{channel}}
WELCOME.CONFIG_SAVED: Configuration saved! Welcome message is configured to send in {{channel}}

FAREWELL.DESCRIPTION: Configure the farewell message for your server
FAREWELL.SUB_CHANNEL: Set the channel to send farewell message
FAREWELL.SUB_THUMBNAIL: Enable or disable thumbnail in farewell message
FAREWELL.SUB_COLOR: Set the color for farewell message
FAREWELL.SUB_IMAGE: Set the image for farewell message
FAREWELL.SUB_MSG_CHANNEL: the channel to send farewell message
FAREWELL.SUB_MSG_THUMBNAIL: enable or disable thumbnail in farewell message
FAREWELL.INVALID_CONTENT: Insufficient arguments! Please provide valid content
FAREWELL.INVALID_COLOR: Invalid color. Value must be a valid hex color code
FAREWELL.INVALID_IMAGE: Invalid image URL. Please provide a valid image URL
FAREWELL.FAREWELL_DISABLED: Farewell message not enabled in this server
FAREWELL.CHANNEL_NOT_CONFIG: No channel is configured to send farewell message
FAREWELL.ENABLED: Configuration saved! Farewell message is now enabled
FAREWELL.DISABLED: Configuration saved! Farewell message is now disabled
FAREWELL.CHANNEL_NO_PERMS: Ugh! I cannot send greeting to that channel? I need the `Write Messages` and `Embed Links` permissions in {{channel}}
FAREWELL.CHANNEL_SET: Configuration saved! Farewell message will be sent to {{channel}}
FAREWELL.CONFIG_SAVED: Configuration saved! Farewell message is configured to send in {{channel}}
